mapper.select: /* 권한별 회원 조회 */ SELECT m.member_id ,m.member_name ,m.member_level ,m.member_nickname ,m.member_post_num ,m.member_addr ,m.member_detail_addr ,m.member_phone ,m.member_birth ,m.member_email ,m.member_date FROM member AS m WHERE m.member_level = #{memberLevel}

/* 등록 날짜별 판매자 사업장 내역 조회 */ SELECT s.seller_store_num ,s.member_id ,s.seller_store_name ,s.seller_license_num ,s.seller_store_phone ,s.seller_store_post_num ,s.seller_store_addr ,s.seller_store_detail_addr ,s.seller_entry_date ,s.seller_tax_type ,m.member_phone FROM seller_store AS s INNER JOIN member AS m WHERE s.seller_entry_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate};

/* 가입 날짜별 회원 내역 조회*/ SELECT m.member_id ,m.member_name ,m.member_level ,m.member_nickname ,m.member_post_num ,m.member_addr ,m.member_detail_addr ,m.member_phone ,m.member_birth ,m.member_email ,m.member_date FROM member AS m WHERE m.member_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate};
/* 회원 로그아웃 내역 조회 */ SELECT l.logout_num ,l.member_id ,m.member_level ,l.logout_time FROM logout_history AS l INNER JOIN member AS m ON l.member_id = m.member_id;
/* 회원 로그인 내역 조회 */ SELECT l.login_num ,l.member_id ,m.member_level ,l.login_time FROM login_history AS l INNER JOIN member AS m ON l.member_id = m.member_id;

/* 조건별 판매자 사업장 검색 */ SELECT s.seller_store_num ,s.member_id ,s.seller_store_name ,s.seller_license_num ,s.seller_store_phone ,s.seller_store_post_num ,s.seller_store_addr ,s.seller_store_detail_addr ,s.seller_entry_date ,s.seller_tax_type FROM seller_store AS s
AND ${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

/* 조건별 회원 검색 */ SELECT m.member_id ,m.member_name ,m.member_level ,m.member_nickname ,m.member_phone ,m.member_post_num ,m.member_addr ,m.member_detail_addr ,m.member_birth ,m.member_email ,m.member_point ,m.member_date FROM member AS m
AND ${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

/* 판매자 사업장 상세 조회 */ SELECT s.seller_store_num ,s.member_id ,s.seller_store_name ,s.seller_license_num ,s.seller_store_phone ,s.seller_store_post_num ,s.seller_store_addr ,s.seller_store_detail_addr ,s.seller_entry_date ,s.seller_tax_type ,m.member_phone FROM seller_store AS s INNER JOIN member AS m WHERE s.seller_store_num = #{sellerStoreNum}

/* 회원별 회원 정보 조회*/ SELECT m.member_id ,m.member_name ,m.member_level ,m.member_pw ,m.member_nickname ,m.member_post_num ,m.member_addr ,m.member_detail_addr ,m.member_phone ,m.member_birth ,m.member_email ,m.member_point ,m.member_date FROM member AS m WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.update: /* 판매자 기준 수정 */ UPDATE seller_standard_benefit SET seller_grade_num = #{sellerGradeNum}, grade_type = #{gradeType}, sell_count = #{sellCount}, sell_amount = #{sellAmount}, seller_starpoint_standard = #{sellerStarpointStandard}, seller_ad_discount = #{sellerAdDiscount}, delivery_price_discount = #{deliveryPriceDiscount} WHERE seller_grade_num = #{sellerGradeNum}
mapper.select: /* 판매자 등급별 조회*/ SELECT s.seller_grade_num ,s.grade_type ,s.sell_count ,s.sell_amount ,s.seller_starpoint_standard ,s.seller_ad_discount ,s.delivery_price_discount FROM seller_standard_benefit AS s WHERE s.seller_grade_num = #{sellerGradeNum};

/* 판매자 등급 기준 및 혜택 */ SELECT s.seller_grade_num ,s.grade_type ,s.sell_count ,s.sell_amount ,s.seller_starpoint_standard ,s.seller_ad_discount ,s.delivery_price_discount FROM seller_standard_benefit AS s

/* 기간 조회 */ SELECT member_id, member_name, member_level, member_pw, member_nickname, member_addr, member_phone, member_birth, member_email, member_point, member_date FROM member WHERE member_date >= #{memberDate};
/* 회원 아이디 중복 체크 */ SELECT IF(COUNT(1) = 1, 0, 1) FROM member AS m WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId};

/* 사업장 목록 조회 */ SELECT s.seller_store_num ,s.member_id ,s.seller_store_name ,s.seller_license_img ,s.seller_license_num ,s.seller_store_phone ,s.seller_entry_date ,s.seller_store_img ,s.seller_store_addr ,s.seller_tax_type FROM seller_store AS s INNER JOIN member AS m ON s.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_level = '판매자';
/* 회원 전체 조회*/ SELECT member_id, member_name, member_level, member_pw, member_nickname, member_addr, member_phone, member_birth, member_email, member_point, member_date FROM member AS m
